name: Crusty Rosemary Garlic Bread
preparation: Combine butter and Rosemary Garlic Seasoning.
Cut bread into thick slices. Spread with butter.
Stack slices back into loaf form and wrap tightly in foil.
tips: Try Epicure’s Herb & Garlic Dip Mix or 3 Onion Dip Mix instead of Rosemary Garlic Seasoning.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavors on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavors on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.
